data.title: THE ROMANCE REPORT
data.text: Says the New York Post, Rose McGowan is being Charmed these days by Sin City director Robert Rodriguez ("They have a professional relationship," counters a publicist), while Colin Farrell is smitten with Lake Bell, his costar in the film Pride & Glory. "Colin's always friendly with his cast mates," says his rep.... Mario Lopez's ex, Ali Landry, married director Alejandro Monteverde on Saturday.... Per the New York Daily News, Carmen Electra celebrated her 36th birthday by arriving separately from hubby Dave Navarro, steering clear of him all night, then leaving two hours after he did. Ouch.
